thread.title: Blackwood Makes History And Delivers The Perfect Response To Critics - Yahoo Sports

author: @YahooCASports
title: Blackwood Makes History And Delivers The Perfect Response To Critics - Yahoo Sports
text:
Blackwood Makes History And Delivers The Perfect Response To Critics Mackenzie Blackwood joined an exclusive class on Wednesday, earning his second consecutive shutout and becoming just the seventh goaltender in franchise history to reach the feat—yet he carried it with characteristic humility.
2:35 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Avalanche Post Third Consecutive Shutout in 6-0 Win Over Sharks The Colorado Avalanche came out red hot against the Sharks, leading to their third consecutive shutout in a 6-0 win.
2:35 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Bednar Puts Blackwood On Notice: "That's A Blacky Problem" Jared Bednar made it very clear that Mackenzie Blackwood needs to step up his game.
1:09 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Rust Gone: Mackenzie Blackwood Delivers Statement Shutout for Avalanche Mackenzie Blackwood has his mojo back and the Colorado Avalanche have won eight straight.
0:55 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Mackenzie Blackwood expected to start against former team Mackenzie Blackwood's first start following off-season surgery to repair a lower body injury could come against the team that traded him.
3:51 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing After early rehab setback, Blackwood shakes off rust Mackenzie Blackwood suffered a setback in his initial recovery in August.
4:14 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing COL@NSH: Blackwood with a great save against Fedor Svechkov Mackenzie Blackwood (COL) makes a save against Fedor Svechkov (NSH) at 02:06
0:24 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Mackenzie Blackwood Addresses Bednar's Criticism: He's Not Wrong; It's the Truth Mackenzie Blackwood is taking responsibility for his slow start.
0:53 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Avalanche Look Like Stanley Cup Front-Runners As Hot Streak Continues The Colorado Avalanche's stunning start has exceeded sky-high expectations, with the Avs thriving in all areas. It's still early days, but all signs point to the road to the Stanley Cup going through Denver this season.
1:21 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Avalanche Emerging As Runaway Favorites For President’s Trophy Colorado's historic pace, bolstered by MacKinnon and elite defense, positions them as unstoppable favorites for the President's Trophy.

1:39 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Mackenzie Blackwood’s conditioning stint with Eagles ends early as Avalanche eye return Mackenzie Blackwood’s unexpectedly brief conditioning stint with the Colorado Eagles appears to signal a pivotal step in his recovery, positioning him for an imminent return to the Avalanche’s NHL roster.
0:37 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing COL@CHI: Wedgewood with a great save against Frank Nazar Scott Wedgewood (COL) makes a save against Frank Nazar (CHI) at 00:43

Discover these under-rostered goalies poised to extend their impressive winning streaks and dominate your fantasy league.
6:19 Now Playing Paused Ad Playing Takeaways: Avalanche extend winning streak to three with win over Bruins Nathan MacKinnon scored twice and Scott Wedgewood stood tall, but there are a few areas that need refinement.
